Question
========
The table below shows the data of 9 students concerning their exam grade
(Y), measured on a scale from 0 to 100, and absence from lecture (X),
measured in the number of missed lectures. The formula that belongs to
the regression line is Y= 96.14+ 2.75\*X. What is the estimated exam
grade of a student who has not missed any lectures and therefore scores
0 on absence?

Solution
========
